replies.msg:
我定義做同期望比落差值大，啫係你係強隊/高身價 期望你做到嘅嘢會多d
所以一般唔會揀廢隊嘅人

個人Candidate List (少睇其他唔熟
待補) 同埋多數big name, 因為無名無姓好難對佢有期望

前鋒：Morata, Benteke, J.Ayew, A.Ayew, Jese, Berahino, Slimani, Rondon, Sturridge, Gabbiadini

中場：Xhaka, Choupo-Moting, Bakayoko, Afellay, A.Silva, B. Silva, Wilshere, Coquelin, Walcott

後衛：Lindelof, Mustafi, Koscielny, G.Cahill, Smalling, D.Luiz, Lovren, Bellerin, D.Rose, Clyne, Baines

龍門：Hart, F.Forster, Cech, Mignolet
